svg.text: Basic AC Waveform and Key Terms

g.text: v(t) = Am sin(ωt + φ) = Am sin(2πft + φ)

svg.text: • Also called amplitude or crest value
• Value at any specific instant of time
• Moving coil meters respond to average
• Rectified AC gives average DC value

g.text: Phase Relationships Between Two AC Waveforms
